verbose_text: XREF_BIBR In contrast, administration of a factor Xa inhibitor (i.e., tinzaparin) to wild-type mice XREF_BIBR or a direct thrombin inhibitor (i.e., lepirudin or argatroban) into wild-type mice XREF_BIBR and hemophilia A mice XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR significantly reduced lung metastasis, suggesting that thrombin generation in the presence or absence of FVIII contributes to pulmonary metastasis.
